text: Couldn't agree more, especially the “borrowed someone else’s t-shirt for the day” sentiment. Not feeling like oneself in tech clothes, still not blending in and maintaining confidence at the same time is not for the faint of heart. https://t.co/AO1tldMY0B

author.name: Theresa Mammarella
author.description:
Developer 🥑 @Sonatype | Computer Engineer | Open Source 
👩‍💻 Prev @RedHat @OpenJDK and @IBM @OpenJ9
🐕  I love to be outside with my foster dog.
